title: An Act establishing the Puerto Rico trade commission

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Ramos of Springfield, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 493) of Orlando Ramos for legislation to establish a Puerto Rico trade commission.  Economic Development and Emerging Technologies.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies

related_entities.name: committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 09/25/2025 from 11:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 09/25/2025 from 11:00 AM-11:30 AM in A-1                                                                                                                  and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
